Class AnnoyingCritter

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • info.gridworld.actor.Critter
        • Critter
          • AnnoyingCritter

  • public class AnnoyingCritter
extends Critter
    A critter that chooses a friend, then chases him or her anywhere. AnnoyingCritter is a subclass of Critter and displays as such.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class info.gridworld.actor.Critter

    • Method Detail

      • processActors

        public void processActors(java.util.ArrayList<Actor> neighbors)
        processActors restricts this AnnoyingCritter's diet to Flower and Rock objects. Specifically, it asks each Flower and Rock object in neighbors to remove itself from a grid. Furthermore, if bFF is null, it is set to a random non-Rock, non-Flower, non-Actor actor.
        Overrides:
        processActors in class Critter
        Parameters:
        neighbors - the ostensibly neighboring Actors whom this AnnoyingCritter will examine for food.

      • selectMoveLocation

        public Location selectMoveLocation(java.util.ArrayList<Location> places)
        selectMoveLocation selects the place in places closest to its bFF.
        Overrides:
        selectMoveLocation in class Critter
        Parameters:
        places - the places that are ostensibly empty and next to this AnnoyingCritter.
        Returns:
        the location that was selected for the next move.
